sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

geraldo_vigil.name: Geraldo's Vigil
geraldo_vigil.summary: Thin the skeleton population on the first floor.
geraldo_vigil.description: Geraldo is concerned about the rising number of undead near the entrance. He needs you to cull their numbers.

book_of_whispers.name: Book of Whispers
book_of_whispers.description: Yukio, the temple keeper, has heard rumors of a book that whispers secrets. He believes it is located in the Shifting Archives (Floor 7).
objectives: Find the Whispering Tome in the Shifting Archives.

silence_the_noise.name: Silence the Noise
silence_the_noise.summary: Destroy Silence Wards in the Archives.
silence_the_noise.description: The Silence Wards in the Archives are blocking Yukio's prayers. Destroy them to restore the connection.

daphne_research.name: Daphne's Research
daphne_research.description: Daphne wants to study the composition of the void. She needs raw essence from the deeper floors.
objectives: Collect Void Essence from Entropy Wisps or chests (Floor 10+).

mirrors_edge.name: The Mirror's Edge
mirrors_edge.description: Daphne is fascinated by the creatures that mimic reality. Defeat a Doppelganger and return with data.

gamblers_luck.name: Gambler's Lucky Charm
gamblers_luck.description: The Gambler lost his lucky die in the Archives. He can't win without it.

merchants_route.name: The Lost Route
merchants_route.description: The Merchant wants to expand his trade routes but fears the Archives. Reach Floor 9 to prove it's safe (or at least passable).

laura_masterpiece.name: Laura's Masterpiece
laura_masterpiece.description: Laura has a vision of a weapon that can cut through the void. She needs Star Metal from the Crystalline Void.

alicia_nightmare.name: Alicia's Nightmare
alicia_nightmare.description: Alicia has been having nightmares about a presence in the Blood Chapel. Put it to rest.
objectives: Defeat the Crimson Lord on Floor 6.

archivist_key.name: The Archivist's Key
archivist_key.description: Yukio needs the key to the Forbidden Library to seal the leaking knowledge.
objectives: Find the Archive Key (Drop from Void Scholar).

crystal_resonance.name: Crystal Resonance
crystal_resonance.description: Daphne needs shards from the Prism Golems to construct a frequency jammer.

history_void.name: History of the Void
history_void.description: The history of the void is written on scattered pages. Collect them to understand the threat.
objectives: Collect 3 Lore Pages (Drops from Silence Wards/Chests).

shattered_reflections.name: Shattered Reflections
shattered_reflections.description: The Doppelgangers are made of a unique glass. Daphne wants to study it.

auction_prize.name: The Auction's Prize
auction_prize.description: The Auctioneer has a client looking for a specific idol from the Heart of Entropy.

final_seal.name: The Final Seal
final_seal.description: The source of the corruption has been located. You must reach the bottom.

wax_collection.name: A Light in the Dark
wax_collection.description: Alicia wants to make candles to brighten up the shop. She needs wax from the living candles in the dungeon.

obsidian_hunt.name: Dark Shards
obsidian_hunt.description: Laura needs obsidian to temper a new alloy. Flauros demons often carry them.
